description: linkml-project-copier is a modern template for creating LinkML-based data modelling projects on GitHub. Built with copier, it supports lifecycle management, enabling updates of derived projects as the template evolves. The template contains various cross-platform usable recipes to help in day-to-day schema development. One of the first applications of the template is the pid4cat-model, a metadata model for handle-based persistent identifiers.
